data.text: Yei ne asɛm a odiyifoɔ Habakuk nya firii Awurade nkyɛn wɔ anisoadehunu mu.
Ao, Awurade, memfrɛ mmisa mmoa nkɔsi da bɛn,
Wɔn ho yɛ hu na nnipa suro wɔn;
Wɔn apɔnkɔ ho yɛ herɛ sene asebɔ,
Wɔn nyinaa ba sɛ wɔrebɛyɛ basabasayɛ.
Wɔbɔ hoo te sɛ mframa kɔ wɔn anim.
Ao, Awurade, wonni hɔ firi tete anaa?
Wʼaniwa yɛ kronkron, a wontumi nhwɛ nnebɔne;
Woama nnipa ayɛ sɛ nsuomnam a ɛwɔ ɛpo mu,
Ɔtamfoɔ tirimuɔdenfoɔ no de darewa yi wɔn,
Ne saa enti ɔbɔ afɔdeɛ ma nʼasau
Enti ɔnkɔ so nni nʼasau mu nam,
